name: big man
description: adds big man to the game!

jumpscare.name: Enable Big Man Jumpscare
jumpscare.description: Enables a picture of Big Man appearing every time you click.

menu.name: Enable Menu Big Man
menu.description: Makes Big Man appear on the main menu.

corner.name: Enable Corner Big Man
corner.description:
Toggle Big Man in the bottom right corner, like in tricipital's streams.
WARNING: the game instantly crashes when playing any online level (for some reason) if this option is enabled!

size.name: Corner Big Man Size
size.description: Size of Big Man in the corner.

corner-text.name: Corner Big Man Text
corner-text.description: wether the text saying "Big Man" should appear when Corner Big Man is enabled.

opacity.name: Corner Big Man Opacity
opacity.description: Opacity of Big Man in the corner.

overlay.name: Big Man Overlay
overlay.description:
Select a blending mode for the Big Man overlay. 
0 = disabled
1 = Additive Blending
2 = Multiplicative Blending
3 = Subtractive Blending
4 = Screen Blending
5 = Darken Blending
6 = Lighten Blending
7 = Inverse Blending
8 = Overlay Blending
WARNING: the game instantly crashes when playing any online level (for some reason) if this option is enabled!

overlay-opacity.name: Big Man Overlay Opacity
overlay-opacity.description: Opacity for the Big Man overlay.
